document_data.name: Uhndek
document_data.mainbody: '''Uhndek''' was the [[lizardfolk]] leader of the [[Khoroshen]] tribe,{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|18}} based in the marshland of the [[Evermoors]] in the 1370s [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|17}}
document_data.Relations: Uhndek had a [[crocodile]] companion named [[Dross]].{{cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|20}}
document_data.Possessions:
<!-- This heading is linked directly. Please bear this in mind when editing or deleting the heading. -->
Uhndek owned a suit of well-made crocodile-[[hide armor]] and carried a spear, ''[[Semuanya's Fang]]'', which had been adorned with [[human]] finger bones and carved runes. He also owned a crocodile-tooth necklace.
document_data.History: In [[1374 DR]], Uhndek and the tribe were hired by First Speaker [[Tessarin Alaurun]] in defense of [[Nesmé]], but Uhndek betrayed the city and made an agreement with the [[troll]]s to work together in attacking Nesmé; the lizardfolk would gain the city and the trolls the surrounding moors. The meeting to agree to this plan was interrupted by Alaurun's aide, [[Chaver Tegarech]], who was captured and taken to mines below [[Baeniff Tor]].
